meanings.definition: A name given to a file stored on a computer.
meanings.sent1: I saved my document with different filenames to keep them organized.
meanings.sent2: The filenames of the photos helped me locate them quickly on my computer.
meanings.sent3: My filenames were like secret codes, making my computer feel like a spy headquarters.
meanings.sent4: The filenames whispered their contents like hidden messages waiting to be decoded.
meanings.sent5: The filenames danced across the screen, each one a unique character in the digital world.

meanings.definition: The name assigned to a file for identification purposes.
meanings.sent1: Remember to use clear filenames so others can easily find the documents.
meanings.sent2: The filenames on the folders made it simple to know what each one contained.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mixed up the filenames, causing confusion in the file system.
meanings.sent4: The filenames stood out like bright labels in a sea of digital information.
meanings.sent5: The filenames acted as tags, guiding me through the maze of files on my computer.
